channel.title: [pi] is it possible to make every see you just acheived 99?
channel.description: subject says it all, im kinda stumped on this.

item.title: [pi] is it possible to make every see you just acheived 99?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:468556”]All you would need to do is modify the method that handles skill changes, increasing the level and such, to basically send a message to all players.

public void handle(SkillChangeEvent event) {
    World.announce(event.getSource() + " has achieved level 99 in " event.getSkill());
}

Note that this code will not work if you just copy and paste it, so you need to modify it to fit your server.[/quote]

@ Original Poster

You would probably recognize a World Announcement as the “Yell” feature.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] is it possible to make every see you just acheived 99?

item.title: [pi] is it possible to make every see you just acheived 99?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

All you would need to do is modify the method that handles skill changes, increasing the level and such, to basically send a message to all players.

public void handle(SkillChangeEvent event) {
    World.announce(event.getSource() + " has achieved level 99 in " event.getSkill());
}

Note that this code will not work if you just copy and paste it, so you need to modify it to fit your server.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] is it possible to make every see you just acheived 99?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Yes, It’s entirely possible. How do you want to do this though? The easiest way would probably be to use something such as a Yell Method when the Player receives the special 99 message. The possibilities on how to tell everyone are endless.

Read full topic
